General.Name: Kencana Energi Lestari
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: PT Kencana Energi Lestari Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a renewable energy company in Indonesia. It owns and operates 4 hydropower plants in North Sumatra, Bengkulu, and South Sulawesi; 1 biomass power plant; and 1 solar energy power plant located in West Bangka, Bangka Belitung Islands. The company also engages in power supply business. It serves industries and householders. PT Kencana Energi Lestari Tbk was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Jakarta Barat, Indonesia.
